text:
Snohomish, Washington
April 17, 1956
Dear Sirs:
I am working on a study, a compilation of methods of using
educational television in the classroom, which will be a part of a
thesis on educational television at the University of Washington. In
addition, I am working on a separate study pertaining to the value of
closed circuit television in facilitating the teaching of certain
core subjects in high school.
If any materials are available in these areas, I would appreciate
receiving them or being informed about them. Any cost will be
promptly reimbursed.
Thank you.
Sincerely yours
Theodore Beckmeyer
Route 3,
Snohomish, Washington
